description: Easy-to-use form for visitors to reach out to your business or support team.
name: Contact Us Form

blocks.label: Company Name
blocks.help: Optional: If applicable, provide the name of your company.
blocks.name: company

blocks.label: Email Address
blocks.help: Please provide your email address so we can respond to your enquiry.
blocks.name: email

blocks.label: Phone Number
blocks.help: Optional: Provide your phone number if you prefer to be contacted by phone.
blocks.name: phone

blocks.label: Subject
blocks.help: Briefly describe the reason for your contact.
blocks.name: subject

blocks.label: Message
blocks.help: Please enter the details of your enquiry or feedback.
blocks.name: message
